document_data.caption: A map showing the Chador in the Corsair Domains.
document_data.name: Chador
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Chador''' was an island found in the [[Corsair Domains]] of [[northwest Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}} The island was part of an archipelago called the [[Desert's Virtues]].

This island was named for a pair of circular elevations that resembled the eye holes of a moral woman's ''[[chador]]''.
document_data.Geography: The Chador was roughly the same size as the [[Camel's Hump]] located just {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} southeast. The island was {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} long and {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}}â€”{{SI|50|mi|k|long=yes}} wide. The eastern side of the island was arid while the western side was heavily forested. An unnamed town was found in the center of a natural bay on the west coast.
